1: שִׁ֗יר <sup>7892 </sup> <n>A Song</n> הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <sup>4609 </sup> <n>of degrees</n> רַ֭בַּת <sup>7227 </sup> <n>Many a time</n> צְרָר֣וּנִי <sup>6887 </sup> <n>have they afflicted</n> מִנְּעוּרַ֑י <sup>5271 </sup> <n>me from my youth</n> יֹֽאמַר־ <sup>559 </sup> <n>now say</n> נָ֝א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>now</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>may Israel</n>
2: רַ֭בַּת <sup>7227 </sup> <n>Many a time</n> צְרָר֣וּנִי <sup>6887 </sup> <n>have they afflicted</n> מִנְּעוּרָ֑י <sup>5271 </sup> <n>me from my youth</n> גַּ֝ם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>Yet</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have not</n> יָ֥כְלוּ <sup>3201 </sup> <n>yet they have not prevailed</n> לִֽי׃
3: עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> גַּ֭בִּי <sup>1354 </sup> <n>upon my back</n> חָרְשׁ֣וּ <sup>2790 </sup> <n>The plowers</n> חֹרְשִׁ֑ים <sup>2790 </sup> <n>plowed</n> הֶ֝אֱרִ֗יכוּ <sup>748 </sup> <n>they made long</n> [לְמַעֲנֹותָם כ] (לְמַעֲנִיתָֽם׃ <sup>4618 </sup> <n>furrow</n> ק)
4: יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> צַדִּ֑יק <sup>6662 </sup> <n>[is] righteous</n> קִ֝צֵּ֗ץ <sup>7112 </sup> <n>he hath cut asunder</n> עֲב֣וֹת <sup>5688 </sup> <n>the cords</n> רְשָׁעִֽים׃ <sup>7563 </sup> <n>of the wicked</n>
5: יֵ֭בֹשׁוּ <sup>954 </sup> <n>Let them all be confounded</n> וְיִסֹּ֣גוּ <sup>5472 </sup> <n>and turned</n> אָח֑וֹר <sup>268 </sup> <n>back</n> כֹּ֝֗ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>may all</n> שֹׂנְאֵ֥י <sup>8130 </sup> <n>that hate</n> צִיּֽוֹן׃ <sup>6726 </sup> <n>Zion</n>
6: יִ֭הְיוּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>them be like</n> כַּחֲצִ֣יר <sup>2682 </sup> <n>Let them be as the grass</n> גַּגּ֑וֹת <sup>1406 </sup> <n>[upon] the housetops</n> שֶׁקַּדְמַ֖ת <sup>6927 </sup> <n>afore</n> שָׁלַ֣ף <sup>8025 </sup> <n>it groweth up</n> יָבֵֽשׁ׃ <sup>3001 </sup> <n>which withereth</n>
7: שֶׁלֹּ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> מִלֵּ֖א <sup>4390 </sup> <n>filleth</n> כַפּ֥וֹ <sup>3709 </sup> <n>not his hand</n> קוֹצֵ֗ר <sup>7114 </sup> <n>Wherewith the mower</n> וְחִצְנ֥וֹ <sup>2683 </sup> <n>his bosom</n> מְעַמֵּֽר׃ <sup>6014 </sup> <n>nor he that bindeth sheaves</n>
8: וְלֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> אָֽמְר֨וּ ׀ <sup>559 </sup> <n>say</n> הָעֹבְרִ֗ים <sup>5674 </sup> <n>Neither do they which go by</n> בִּרְכַּֽת־ <sup>1293 </sup> <n>The blessing</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> בֵּרַ֥כְנוּ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>[be] upon you we bless</n> אֶ֝תְכֶ֗ם <sup>853 </sup> בְּשֵׁ֣ם <sup>8034 </sup> <n>you in the name</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n>
